article.headline: Prairie View 62, Alabama A&amp,M 53
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Michael Griffin and Chris Sights scored 11 points each to lead Prairie View A&M to a 62-53 victory against Alabama A&M on Saturday night. Christopher Jones and Darnell Hugee had 10 points apiece for the Panthers (15-11, 10-5 Southwestern Athletic Conference). Bo Amusa had 16 points and 12 rebounds for Alabama A&M (10-13, 7-8), which shot 18 of 71 (25.4 percent) from the field. The Bulldogs made just five first-half field goals -- and went a stretch of 8:50 without a basket -- en route to trailing 31-15 at halftime. Jones had eight rebounds and five assists.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
